title: Patriots rush Buffalo; MVP Race; Peyton Manning; Eli Manning; Zachary Levi
itunes:title: Patriots rush Buffalo; MVP Race; Peyton Manning; Eli Manning; Zachary Levi
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Kurt Warner start the show sharing what they learned from the New England Patriots and Buffalo Bills after the Patriots won, despite only throwing the ball three times on Monday Night Football. Next, they list off names who are in the running for MVP and discuss if TJ Watt should be considered for the award; then they're joined by Peyton Manning and Eli Manning and they share their thoughts on the Walter Payton Man of the Year award and the ManningCast; and lastly, they're joined by Zachary Levi and he shares what it was like to play Kurt Warner in the movie "American Underdog".

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
